unshippedItems.pageDescription: Manage partial order fulfillments and items that were ordered but could not be shipped due to stock limitations.
unshippedItems.title: Unshipped Items
unshippedItems.orderCentricDescription: Orders with items pending shipment and authorization
unshippedItems.aboutDescription: Understand how unshipped items are managed in the system
unshippedItems.whatAreUnshippedItemsDescription: Unshipped items occur when a customer orders products that are currently out of stock or have insufficient quantity. Instead of cancelling the entire order, the system allows for partial fulfillment.
unshippedItems.authorizationProcessDescription: Unshipped items require manager authorization before they can be fulfilled in subsequent orders. This ensures proper oversight of partial fulfillment processes.
unshippedItems.managersResponsibilityDescription: As a manager, you can review and authorize unshipped items. Once authorized, these items will be prioritized for inclusion in new orders for the same customer.
unshippedItems.noOrdersPendingAuthorization: No orders have items pending authorization
unshippedItems.noItemsToAuthorize: No items to authorize in selected orders

partiallyShipped.title: Partially Shipped Orders
partiallyShipped.description: Orders where some items have been shipped but others are still pending

orderQuality.adjustmentQuestion: The quality issue has been created successfully. Do you want to adjust inventory levels for the affected products now?
orderQuality.inventoryImpactExplanation: This quality issue may affect your inventory levels

inventoryAdjustmentExamples.missing: Missing items may require reducing inventory to match actual stock
inventoryAdjustmentExamples.wrong: Wrong items shipped may require adjusting multiple products
inventoryAdjustmentExamples.damaged: Damaged items might need to be removed from available inventory

orderQuality.adjustmentsDescription: Use positive values to increase inventory or negative values to decrease

orderQuality.createSuccessDescription: The quality issue has been reported successfully

deleteOrder.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the order and all related data, including order items, shipping documents and history.
deleteOrder.warning: Warning: This will delete all data associated with this order including order items, shipping documents, and order history.

production.recipeCreatedSuccessfully: The recipe has been created successfully

production.quantityMustBePositive: Quantity must be a positive number
production.flowMaterialsDescription: Manage raw materials inventory for production
production.flowRecipesDescription: Create and manage product recipes and formulas
production.flowOrdersDescription: Manage production orders from start to finish
production.recordMaterialConsumptionDesc: Record the materials used for this production order
production.inventoryWarningDesc: There is insufficient stock for the quantity you entered. Please check inventory before proceeding.
production.coreChecksCompletedDesc: All required core quality checks have been completed. You can add more checks or proceed.
production.requiredChecksRemainingDesc: Please complete at least the core checks: appearance, odor, taste and color.
production.checkPassedDescription: Select whether the product passed this quality check
production.qualityCheckDescription: Perform quality checks to ensure product meets quality standards
production.qualityCheckNotesPlaceholder: Add notes about the quality check...
production.productionGuideDescription: Follow these steps to manage your production process
production.step1Description: Before starting production, ensure you have all necessary raw materials in stock.
production.step1Bullet1: Add all raw materials used in production
production.step1Bullet2: Set minimum stock levels to get alerts when materials are running low
production.step1Bullet3: Update quantities when new materials arrive
production.step2Description: Create detailed recipes that define how raw materials are transformed into finished products.
production.step2Bullet1: Define required raw materials and quantities
production.step2Bullet3: Set expected yield for finished products
production.step3Description: Plan and schedule production batches to organize your production process.
production.step3Bullet1: Create production batches with start and end dates
production.step3Bullet2: Allocate resources and capacity for each batch
production.step4Description: Create and track production orders to manage the entire production workflow.
production.step4Bullet1: Create production orders based on specific recipes
production.step4Bullet3: Record actual quantities produced and material consumption
production.tutorialOverviewContent: This module helps you manage the entire production process from raw materials to finished products. Use the visual workflow to navigate between different production stages.
production.tutorialMaterialsContent: Add and track your raw materials inventory. Set minimum stock levels to get alerts when materials are running low.
production.tutorialRecipesContent: Create recipes that define how raw materials are transformed into finished products. Specify ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
production.tutorialBatchesContent: Schedule production batches to produce your products. Track batch progress and manage production schedules.
production.tutorialOrdersContent: Create and track production orders based on your recipes. Monitor production progress and manage completion.
production.tutorialWorkflowContent: Start by adding raw materials, then create recipes using those materials. Next, schedule production batches and create production orders to track the process.
production.materialsTip1: Set accurate minimum stock levels to get timely alerts
production.materialsTip2: Include supplier information for easy reordering
production.materialsTip3: Use the same units consistently to avoid conversion errors
production.recipesTip1: Include detailed step-by-step instructions for consistent results
production.recipesTip2: Specify exact quantities of materials needed for accurate inventory planning
production.recipesTip3: Document expected yield to track production efficiency
production.batchesTip1: Schedule production during optimal times (seasonal considerations)
production.batchesTip2: Create batches of appropriate size for your equipment capacity
production.batchesTip3: Update batch status in real-time to maintain accurate production tracking
production.ordersTip1: Link production orders to specific batches for better traceability
production.ordersTip2: Record actual production quantities to track losses and efficiency
production.ordersTip3: Use the production log to document issues and improvements for future reference
production.footerInfo: The production module tracks the entire process from raw materials to finished products, ensuring quality control and traceability.

inventoryPredictions.title: Inventory Predictions
inventoryPredictions.description: Use data-driven predictions to optimize your inventory levels and avoid stockouts
inventoryPredictions.reorderRequiredDescription: Products predicted to need restocking based on demand forecasts
inventoryPredictions.noReorderRequired: No products require reordering at this time
inventoryPredictions.generateSuccessDescription: New inventory predictions have been successfully generated
inventoryPredictions.createSuccessDescription: New prediction has been successfully created
inventoryPredictions.saveError: There was an error saving the prediction
inventoryPredictions.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this prediction? This action cannot be undone.
inventoryPredictions.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this prediction...

howItWorks.title: How Inventory Predictions Work
howItWorks.description: Our system uses various algorithms to predict future inventory needs based on historical data
howItWorks.movingAverage: Calculates the average demand over a specified period to predict future needs
howItWorks.linearRegression: Uses trend analysis to project future demand based on historical patterns
howItWorks.seasonalAdjustment: Accounts for seasonal variations in product demand throughout the year
howItWorks.weightedAverage: Gives more importance to recent data points to better reflect current trends

inventoryPredictions.forecastDescription: Projected stock levels based on historical data and predicted demand
